translation.en: [man over PA] Please welcome to the ice our Pinecrest skating pro Katarina Baker.
translation.it: Diamo il benvenuto in pista alla stella di Pinecrest, Katarina Baker.

translation.en: -[man 1] Kill it! -[man 2] Go for gold, Kat!
translation.it: - Dai! - Porta a casa l'oro, Kat.

translation.en: -[Serena sighing] How are you so awake? -♪ We're all in this together ♪
translation.it: Come fai a essere così attiva?

translation.en: -[Serena] Is it really that bad? -[Kat] Yeah. [chuckles]
-Did you look in the mirror this morning? -No! [laughs]
translation.it: Ti sei vista allo specchio? No!

translation.en: How are my wonderful girls this morning?
translation.it: Come stanno le mie ragazze stamattina?

translation.en: It's so early. If I eat, I'm gonna puke.
translation.it: È presto. Se mangio qualcosa, vomito.

translation.en: What did Mitch say about getting enough protein?
And I hope you've been practicing your triple toe like you promised him.
translation.it: Spero ti sia esercitata nel triplo toe loop.

translation.en: Because I overheard Nancy talking to the moms yesterday,
translation.it: Perché Nancy ha detto alle altre mamme

translation.en: and they said you're still wrapping.
Look, I know Nancy can be a cunt, but you've gotta stop doing that.
translation.it: Nancy a volte fa la stronza, ma devi smetterla.

translation.en: Can't hold on to bad habits.

translation.it: Me ne frego. Sua figlia fa schifo.

translation.en: You know Emily cheats her triple toe. She's fat.
translation.it: Emily bara nel triplo toe loop. È grassa.

translation.en: Remember, a flying spin, a spin combo,
and don't even think about popping your double axel or a single one of those four double jumps.
translation.it: e non osare aprirti nel doppio axel o nei quattro salti doppi.

translation.en: I read the rule book, Mom.
Liz isn't gonna be there tonight.
Well, you don't need a coach to hold your hand for an easy test.
translation.it: Non hai bisogno di nessuno per un test così facile.
Il test senior non è facile.

translation.en: Oh, come on. You'll pass it. If you didn't, it'd be--
translation.it: Oh, andiamo. Lo supererai. Se non ce la fai...

translation.en: If I'm gonna coach, I need to pass this test.
translation.it: Per allenare devo passare il test.

translation.en: And if I'm gonna pass this test, I need Liz there.
translation.it: E per passare il test mi serve Liz.

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry, but I just can't afford to pay for both of your coaching anymore.
translation.it: Beh, non posso più permettermi gli allenamenti per entrambe.

translation.en: Were you wearing that shirt last time I saw you?
translation.it: Non avevi quella camicia anche ieri?

translation.en: Uh, me and my boys went skiing last night.
translation.it: Siamo andati a sciare, ieri sera.

translation.en: Decided to camp up there so we could get first tracks on the pow this morning.
translation.it: Abbiamo dormito in tenda per essere i primi sulla pol.

translation.en: That's the whitest shit I ever said.
translation.it: Che cosa da bianco che ho detto.

translation.en: You bring it out of me.
[Serena] I'm not trying to be mean. I just...
translation.it: Non è per essere cattiva, io...

translation.en: Seriously. I'm not kidding. I'm not kidding!
What the fuck happened to you?
God, I wish he'd wise up and fuck me.
You know Basic Bitch is his third partner in three years? It'll be out with the old, in with the new any day now.
translation.it: Quella è la terza partner in tre anni. Non manca molto alla prossima.

translation.en: Are you telling me that you want to skate with him?
translation.it: Vuoi dire che vuoi pattinare con lui?

translation.en: I trust no man to throw me five feet in the air going 20 miles an hour.
translation.it: Non mi fido a farmi lanciare per aria a 30 km orari.
Lo sai che se lo scopa.

translation.en: I don't know. I feel sorry for Natalie. -She has to put up with him. -Hm.
translation.it: Non saprei. Mi dispiace per Natalie. Deve sopportarlo.

translation.en: I caught up on a full season of Stranger Things.
translation.it: Ho visto una stagione di Stranger Things.

translation.en: -[woman] I told you guys I was right! -[laughing]
Once that Zamboni's off, I want you stepping on the ice.
translation.it: Quando la Zamboni ha finito ti voglio in pista.

translation.en: How long has Serena been training with him?
translation.it: Da quanto si allena con lui?

translation.en: I guess he approached her at that training camp.
translation.it: L'avrà incontrata al campo di addestramento.

translation.en: Mom fired Sharon after coaching Serena for ten years.
translation.it: Mamma ha licenziato Sharon dopo 10 anni con Serena.

translation.en: Yup. I'm coachless, and she gets the former Olympian.
translation.it: Sì, io senza allenatore e lei si prende l'ex atleta olimpionico.

translation.en: Only the best for Idaho's golden child.
translation.it: Solo il meglio per la bambina prodigio.
- Stai parlando di mia sorella. - E allora?

translation.en: Serena becomes a senior this summer,
and now I'm coming in second as she's waving on top of the podium.
translation.it: sul gradino più alto del podio, e io eterna seconda.

translation.en: You're so lucky you don't have to compete against her.
translation.it: Sei fortunata a non competere con lei.

translation.en: All I'm focused on right now is passing my senior test.
translation.it: Mi sto concentrando solo sul test senior.

translation.en: Does your sister always pop her jumps like that?
translation.it: Tua sorella apre sempre i salti?

translation.en: She usually chickens out at the last second.
translation.it: Se la fa sotto all'ultimo secondo.

translation.en: [Kat] What the hell are you doing?
Did you not see me there?
You weren't even gonna try! You never do!
Just saying, maybe it's time you get out of the way!
translation.it: Forse è ora che ti levi di torno!

translation.en: [man] Holy shit! It went through her foot.
Get her off the ice right now!
I know. It took the EMT a full minute to get that blade out of her foot.
translation.it: Lo so. Ci è voluto un minuto per estrarle la lama dal piede.

translation.en: -She'll be off the ice for months. -Uh!
I mean, that's why I come here every day.
translation.it: Ecco perché vengo qui ogni giorno.

translation.en: If Emily ever had a fall like that, at least I could be with her on the way to the hospital.
translation.it: Se Emily cadesse così, almeno potrei andare con lei all'ospedale.

translation.en: Emily can't jump high enough to get that kind of injury.
translation.it: Non salterà mai così in alto da farsi male.

translation.en: [Nancy] When I heard what happened, I was sure it had something to do with Justin acting up again.
translation.it: Quando ho saputo del fatto, ero certa fosse per i capricci di Justin.

translation.en: -There's a first time for everything. -[all laughing]
translation.it: Beh, c'è una prima volta per tutto, no?

translation.en: You're really coming along on your triple toe, honey.
translation.it: Il triplo toe loop ti viene meglio.

translation.en: Honestly, it's taken a lot of retraining out of some bad habits.
translation.it: Non è stato facile sbarazzarsi delle cattive abitudini.

translation.en: I'm lucky she's so talented, and I have you to thank for that.
translation.it: Fortuna che ha talento ed è merito tuo.

translation.en: Well, I'm just so happy that you agreed to come teach here.
translation.it: Sono felice tu sia qui per allenarla.

translation.en: -You're putting us back on the map. -No. Please, you're too kind.
translation.it: - Ci stai rimettendo in gioco. - Sei troppo gentile.
- Certo. - Signore. - A presto, Carol. - Sì.

translation.en: Could be quicker on the landing. You should be watching Serena's axels.
translation.it: Magari sii più veloce nell'atterraggio. Fai come Serena.

translation.en: She's always very quick twitch. In, out.
Are you ready for your test?
I could whack her knee with a bat.
You want me to be there tonight?
Better if I'm alone for this one.
Jesus! What are you doing here?
translation.it: Cristo! Che ci fa lei qui?

translation.en: You should not be popping such a simple jump as a double lutz.
translation.it: Non dovresti aprirti in un salto facile come il doppio lutz.

translation.en: The story is your coach made you lift your arms on the triple
translation.it: Ti hanno detto di alzare le braccia nel triplo

translation.en: I hear a rumor that you'd given it up.
translation.it: Ho sentito dire che hai smesso.

translation.en: You have a very strong upper body, perfect for pair skating.
translation.it: Hai un corpo perfetto per il pattinaggio di coppia.

translation.en: I will help you pass some tests.
translation.it: Ti aiuterò a superare i test.

translation.en: Show you how to do throws. Teach you how to jump again.
translation.it: Vedremo i salti lanciati. Salterai di nuovo.

translation.en: -You'll be great. -I know how to jump.
you land all your triple jumps consistently not so long ago.
translation.it: che non tanto tempo fa non sbagliavi mai un salto triplo,

translation.en: Now you're just a little scared.
translation.it: ora hai solo un po' di paura.
Non ho un po' di paura.

translation.en: [Kat] No one starts pair skating at 21.
translation.it: Chi inizia in coppia a 21 anni?

translation.en: I'm not afraid of a challenge.
Hey, what are you doing here? I thought you were at your test.
translation.it: Che ci fai qui? Credevo fossi al test.

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's just been a while since...
translation.it: Mi dispiace. È da un po' che...
Lo sport ti fa dare di matto.

translation.en: You don't have to worry about that anymore.
The next test is in six months, and I can't afford to wait that long.
translation.it: Il prossimo test è tra sei mesi e non posso aspettare così tanto.

translation.en: I applied to this fellowship last year in London,
translation.it: avevo fatto domanda per una borsa di studio a Londra

translation.en: and it didn't look like it was gonna pan out.
translation.it: e non sembrava che sarebbe andata bene.

translation.en: But then I got the news this morning that it's happening.
translation.it: Ma stamattina mi hanno detto che ho vinto.

translation.en: -Wh-- -And I want you to come with me. [laughs]
translation.it: - Cosa? - Voglio che vieni con me.

translation.en: Come on. You're quitting anyway. This is your chance to just...
translation.it: Dai. Tanto vuoi mollare. È la tua occasione di...

translation.en: Just promise me that you'll think about it.
You know, I can't believe it's all finally over.
translation.it: Non riesco a credere che sia tutto finito.

translation.en: I always thought I'd make my mark, you know?
translation.it: Credevo che avrei lasciato il segno.

translation.en: After all the years of training...
I thought I'd see it through to the end.
Did you not hear me? Get up!
She told me I have to do 30 laps around the block if I want to make Worlds.
translation.it: Dice che devo fare 30 giri di corsa per arrivare ai Mondiali.

translation.en: Putting in my notice at the airport tomorrow,
so I can focus full time on Serena's training. And the night shift's just too much.
translation.it: E penso solo ad allenare Serena. Basta col turno di notte.

translation.en: If I hadn't gotten pregnant with you, I would've gone to the Olympics!
translation.it: Se non fossi nata tu sarei andata alle Olimpiadi!

translation.en: There's not a day I don't think about that!
translation.it: Non c'è giorno in cui non ci pensi!

translation.en: Look! Look at what you're doing to her!
translation.it: Guarda! Guarda cosa le stai facendo.

translation.en: You're gonna take it while I watch.
I think I re-sprained my wrist.
translation.it: Mi sono slogata di nuovo il polso.

translation.en: Go inside, put some ice on it,
take a shower, get into bed.
translation.it: fa' una doccia, vai a letto.

translation.en: I'll call Dr. Parker in the morning.
I'll come back and check on you, okay?
I've got a lot on my plate.
I put up with these rich-ass people
translation.it: Sopporto questi ricconi per pagarmi gli skipass

translation.en: just so I can save up for my lift passes and ski with my boys.
translation.it: Sopporto questi ricconi per pagarmi gli skipass e sciare con gli amici.

translation.en: Well, it's about to get a lot less complicated.
translation.it: Beh, sta per diventare tutto più facile.

translation.en: And I'm thinking about moving to London with Dave.
translation.it: E credo mi trasferirò a Londra con Dave.

translation.en: -Hey, kid. -Good to see you too, sir.
Looks like the owners are here.
Kat Baker! I heard you were working today. How you doin', sweetheart?
translation.it: Kat Baker! Sapevo oggi avresti lavorato. Come va?

translation.en: I'm good, thanks. What can I get you guys?
translation.it: Sto bene, grazie. Cosa posso portarvi?

translation.en: [Reid] Strawberry daiquiri with a lot of rum, please.
translation.it: Un daiquiri alla fragola, con tanto rum.

translation.en: Dasha tells me that you may be my son's new partner.
translation.it: Dasha mi ha detto che potresti fare coppia con mio figlio.
Beh, in realtà me ne vado.

translation.en: Listen, I understand money's a little tight right now,
translation.it: So che hai pochi soldi al momento

translation.en: so I'd like to help you out with that.
Just think, instead of taking drink orders from my guests,
translation.it: Pensa, invece di prendere ordini dai miei clienti,

translation.en: I'd be paying you to do something you love.
translation.it: ti pagherei per fare qualcosa che ami.

translation.en: Either way, the money's coming from the same place.
translation.it: I soldi vengono dallo stesso posto.

translation.en: She's heard you, honey. Let's give her some time to think, maybe.
translation.it: Ti ha sentito, tesoro. Dalle tempo per pensare.

translation.en: Listen, I'm not trying to strong-arm you.
translation.it: Senti, non voglio forzarti la mano.

translation.en: It's just, you know, when my late wife first got Justin into figure skating,
translation.it: Quando la mia defunta moglie iscrisse Justin a pattinaggio artistico,

translation.en: I was a little worried he might turn into some kind of a fruitcake.
translation.it: ero un po' preoccupato diventasse una checca.

translation.en: But, you know, she saw something in him, and it turns out she was right.
translation.it: Ma aveva visto qualcosa in lui e aveva ragione.
Il mio ragazzo ha la stoffa del campione olimpionico.

translation.en: He just needs a partner now who can match that.
translation.it: Gli serve solo una partner all'altezza.

translation.en: -I'm suddenly in the mood for champagne. -Ooh!
translation.it: Mi è venuta voglia di champagne.

translation.en: Bring us a bottle of my good stuff.
I think we may have gotten through to her.
Look, I just wanted to apologize for my husband.
translation.it: Senti, volevo solo scusarmi per mio marito.

translation.en: He really is a good person.
You don't have to. It's fine.
translation.it: Non ce n'è bisogno. Va bene.

translation.en: He put you on the spot, and I saw your face,
translation.it: Ti ha messo in imbarazzo, si capiva.

translation.en: and you looked like you were about to kill him.
If I didn't love that man so much, I'd wanna kill him too.
translation.it: Se non lo amassi tanto, vorrei ucciderlo anch'io.

translation.en: Okay, so I know Justin is a goddamn pain in the ass,
translation.it: Ok, lo so, Justin è un vero rompicoglioni

translation.en: and I wish him on no woman, but I also know he is the real deal.
translation.it: e nessuno si merita di sopportarlo, ma ha anche della stoffa da vendere.

translation.en: And that boy has a gift.
translation.it: E quel ragazzo ha un dono.

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm not trying to sell you on him again.
translation.it: Non voglio provare a convincerti di nuovo.

translation.en: And it's not my place to tell you what to do...
translation.it: E non è compito mio dirti cosa fare...

translation.en: but if you do choose to partner with Justin,
translation.it: ma se scegli di fare coppia con Justin,

translation.en: just know that you've got an ally in me.
translation.it: sappi che sarò una tua alleata.

translation.en: All right. I'd better get back in there before James starts to wonder
translation.it: Meglio che vada prima che James inizi a chiedersi

translation.en: what's taking me so long in the bathroom. [chuckles]
translation.it: perché ci metto tanto in bagno.

translation.en: I had her take a sedative and call into work sick.
translation.it: Le ho dato un sedativo e detto di darsi malata.

translation.en: Why are you suddenly wearing eyeliner?
translation.it: Da quando in qua ti trucchi?

translation.en: I thought he was gonna tell me to stay home because of my wrist,
translation.it: Pensavo mi mandasse a casa per il polso,

translation.en: but he had me doing off-ice training literally all day long.
translation.it: invece mi ha fatto allenare a secco tutto il giorno.

translation.en: Serena, I don't like the way he acts around you.
translation.it: Non mi piace come si comporta con te.

translation.en: I saw him slap your ass with his gloves the other day.
translation.it: L'ho visto che ti sculacciava con i guanti.

translation.en: Oh, my God. It was a joke.
Serena, you really have to be careful about who you trust.
translation.it: Serena, devi stare attenta a chi dare fiducia.

translation.en: Have you ever thought that after
everything that has happened with you and Mom,
translation.it: che dopo ciò che è successo tra te e mamma

translation.en: Mitch is the only person in my life I can trust?
translation.it: Mitch è l'unico di cui possa fidarmi?

translation.en: I'm just trying to look out for you.
I think you're doing this because you're jealous.
translation.it: credo tu lo faccia perché sei gelosa.

translation.en: Your Olympic dreams are over, and mine are just beginning.
translation.it: I tuoi sogni sono finiti, i miei sono solo all'inizio.

translation.en: The best that you could've hoped for was coaching.
translation.it: Il meglio in cui potevi sperare era allenare.

translation.en: But now that you've failed your test, you can't even do that.
translation.it: Ma non hai passato il test e non puoi.

translation.en: you're trying to screw up my training by attacking Mitch.
translation.it: stai cercando di rovinarmi attaccando Mitch.

translation.en: Why do you always have to be such a little bitch, Serena?
translation.it: Perché devi sempre fare la stronzetta, Serena?
Tutti pensano tu sia un angioletto.

translation.en: You are just as messed up and bipolar as she is.
translation.it: Sei incasinata e bipolare esattamente come lei.

translation.en: I've been able to manage it.
The rink doesn't open till 5:00 a.m.
Are you trying to kill an old lady?
For when you change your mind.
You should talk to my sister.
Serena's better than I am. She's the one you want.
translation.it: Serena è meglio di me. È lei che vuole.
Ma tu hai un certo quid

translation.en: in a way your sister never will.
translation.it: che tua sorella non avrà mai.

translation.en: Your only option is to get off that leg and rehab it
translation.it: Hai un'unica scelta: riposo e riabilitazione
Ho i Regionali tra tre mesi.

translation.en: If you don't rest your hip now,
you're not just gonna have trouble skating. You could have trouble walking.
translation.it: avrai problemi a pattinare e anche a camminare.

translation.en: Okay, I'm out. See you later.
I know I could use a drink.
We're gonna have so much fun!

translation.it: Stai benissimo. Ci divertiremo un mondo, ok?

translation.en: -We're gonna have a lot of fun, okay? -Welcome.
translation.it: Stai benissimo. Ci divertiremo un mondo, ok? Benvenute.

translation.en: [Jenn] That would be great, thank you.
I think I'll need one more.
It'll help numb the pain of knowing you're moving to London.
translation.it: Per dimenticare che ti trasferirai a Londra.

translation.en: Oh, I have something for you.
translation.it: Oh, ho una cosa per te.

translation.en: I found it when I was cleaning the house the other day.
[Kat chuckles] Wow! I can't believe you still have this.
Remember what we promised each other that summer? [laughs]
Seems like a reasonable motto when you're nine.
translation.it: A nove anni sembra un motto sensato.

translation.en: -Kat-- -Look, I know what you're trying to do.
translation.it: - Kat... - Senti, so cosa stai facendo.

translation.en: I'm not gonna stay, okay? I can't even pass my senior test.
translation.it: Non resto, ok? Non riesco neanche a superare quel test.

translation.en: I really don't think you should give it all up.
What opportunity are you talking about exactly?
translation.it: E di quale opportunità parli esattamente?

translation.en: How the hell do you even know about that?
I know everything that happens at that stupid rink.
translation.it: So tutto ciò che accade in quella pista.

translation.en: I don't understand why everyone suddenly thinks this is a good idea.
translation.it: Non capisco perché, all'improvviso, tutti pensino sia una buona idea.

translation.en: Do it for that little girl.
[Justin] Thanks for talking to her for me.
Not sure it's gonna work, but I did my best.
translation.it: Non so se funzionerà, ma ho fatto del mio meglio.

translation.en: -Oops. -[Mitch] Hey. Kat Baker, are you drunk?
She just had a little too much to drink.
If you ever hurt my sister,
translation.it: Se fai del male a mia sorella,

translation.en: You guys wanna go to Jimmy's after this?
Maybe stop pretending like you hate me.
I don't know what game you're playing, but just stop.
translation.it: Non so che gioco fai, ma smettila.

translation.en: I'm not. I just think we'd work well together.
translation.it: Non gioco. Penso staremmo bene insieme.

translation.en: 'Cause, unlike what everybody thinks, I actually do care about skating.
translation.it: Nonostante ciò che dicono tutti, amo davvero pattinare.

translation.en: So you had your dad try and buy me?
translation.it: E hai chiesto a papà di comprarmi?

translation.en: Do you know how humiliating that was for me?
translation.it: Sai quanto è stato umiliante per me?

translation.en: -It's just how he does things. -[sighs] Great.
translation.it: - È così che fa le cose. - Ottimo.

translation.en: And don't tell me you couldn't use the help.
translation.it: Come se non ti farebbe comodo.

translation.en: I will never take a handout from you.
translation.it: Non accetterò mai la tua elemosina.

translation.en: Help yourselves. It's on my dad.
Should you really be out on a school night?
Well, I heard you're a skater.
Isn't this thing kinda frowned upon?
They can't frown upon anything they don't know about.
translation.it: Non se nessuno lo viene a sapere.

translation.en: Just got off the phone with Mitch.
He was telling me that you were drunk and acting inappropriate at some bar.
translation.it: Eri ubriaca e ti sei comportata in modo inappropriato.

translation.en: I don't trust him around Serena.
translation.it: Non mi fido di lui con Serena.

translation.en: It's the way he... he touches her, you know?
translation.it: È il modo in cui la tocca. Capisci?

translation.en: It's an instinct. Something's not right, Mom.
Look, I am so sorry that I've put you through all of this lately.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per tutto quello che ti sto facendo passare.

translation.en: I know my episodes can trigger yours.
translation.it: So che i miei episodi possono scatenare i tuoi.

translation.en: If you haven't been taking your meds-- Mom, come on.
translation.it: - Se non prendi le medicine... - Mamma, dai.

translation.en: You know what I'm talking about.
God, I wish I hadn't told you that.

translation.it: Senti, a volte io e te

translation.en: we just-- we can't trust ourselves, honey.
translation.it: non possiamo fidarci di noi stesse.

translation.en: Every day, I wish you didn't get my brain, but you did.
translation.it: Vorrei tu non avessi la mia testa ma ce l'hai.

translation.en: And so you have to be very careful when you get these "instincts."
translation.it: Quindi devi stare molto attenta con queste sensazioni.

translation.en: Well, it's looking a lot like it did last time.
translation.it: Beh, sembra molto come l'ultima volta.

translation.en: You don't get to do this.
I'm gonna go live in London with Dave.
translation.it: Vado a vivere a Londra con Dave.

translation.en: I thought you were gonna pass your senior test?
translation.it: Non volevi superare il test senior?

translation.en: You were there. You saw what happened.
Well, you can take it again in six months.
translation.it: Beh, puoi ridarlo tra sei mesi.

translation.en: Why do you suddenly care about me becoming a coach so much?
translation.it: Ora t'importa che io diventi allenatrice?

translation.en: Do you seriously think I wanted you to become a coach?
I wanted you to pass so that you could put everything that happened to you behind you.
translation.it: Volevo passassi il test per lasciarti il passato alle spalle.

translation.en: Get back on the competition track where you belong.
translation.it: Torna a competere, è lì che appartieni.

translation.en: You and me, Kat, we're the same...
always tripping at the finish line.
God, I wish we had Serena's toughness. I really do.
translation.it: Se solo noi fossimo forti come Serena.

translation.en: I'm not gonna lose three jobs in three years 'cause I keep forgetting to take my meds.
translation.it: Non perderò tre lavori in tre anni perché non prendo le medicine.

translation.en: I'm not gonna sleep with losers
who throw me away after one night!
translation.it: che mi scaricano dopo una notte!

translation.en: I'm not gonna train my children so hard,
translation.it: Non allenerò così tanto le mie figlie

translation.en: my youngest ends up in the emergency room!
translation.it: da mandare la più piccola al pronto soccorso!

translation.en: then why did I drive you to 5:00 a.m. practice every day for fucking ten years?
translation.it: perché ti ho portato ad allenamento alle 5:00 per dieci anni?

translation.en: Why did I fight to get you all the best coaches...
translation.it: Perché ti ho fatto avere i migliori coach

translation.en: and work overtime every chance I could get so that you could have ice time
translation.it: e ho fatto gli straordinari per farti passare più tempo sul ghiaccio

translation.en: and pay for your medical bills after your fall?
Don't try and make this about me!
translation.it: Non provare a dare la colpa a me!

translation.en: This has always been about you!
You just can't stand to let Serena have a turn in the spotlight, can you?
translation.it: Non sopporti che Serena sia sotto i riflettori, eh?

translation.en: Everything I worked for with Kat is garbage, so I threw it away.
translation.it: Tutto ciò che ho fatto con Kat è spazzatura: l'ho buttato.

translation.en: This is my son. This is the guy I told you about.
translation.it: Ecco mio figlio. Ti ho parlato di lui.

translation.en: Leah just moved here from Seattle, and she's in the market for a new partner.
translation.it: Leah è appena arrivata da Seattle e sta cercando un nuovo partner.

translation.en: her and her family just happen to be staying with us here at the lodge.
translation.it: lei e la sua famiglia staranno con noi qui al Lodge.

translation.en: ♪ By the time you call my name ♪ ♪ I'm long gone ♪
♪ Ain't finished till the finish line comes ♪
